short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Changes all instances of the phrase 'Joe Biden' on a webpage to 'Joe Budden.'

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Restore Alexis de Tocqueville's Platonic ideal of democracy in America by replacing all instances of the phrase "Joe Biden" with "Joe Budden."
